channel.title: Mystery Lag
channel.description:
Hi,
When my server has been running for a while, somehow players will start lagging horribly randomly. It doesn't happen to players on different heights, or other locations, just in the main area.
Can't figure out the problem. I was wondering if someone could go through my server, find and fix the cause?
I also have some nullerpointexceptions I need to get rid of and if you could fix xlog (i just have it drop all your items on xlog for now) that would be great...
Let me know what you can do and how much it'll cost.
Thank you,
EDIT: Averages about 40 players online, usually happens when i'm sleeping, so not sure what's causing it!

item.title: Mystery Lag
item.dc:creator: @Ciber Ciber
item.description:
@Ciber wrote:

Well that error was fixed, anyone else got ideas? Bump till you do!

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery Lag
item.dc:creator: @Jakes10 Jakes10
item.description:
@Jakes10 wrote:

Happened last night, and yesterday like 3 times. Hasn’t happened yet today.

It’s really weird, server has to be restarted to fix the problem.

Using the base Deltacleaned.

Read full topic

item.title: Mystery Lag
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

How often it happen? Im going to bed now but if someone hasn’t answered you by tomorrow I’ll try help.

Read full topic
